Uses of Package
hioa.android.chess

  • Classes in hioa.android.chess used by hioa.android.chess 
    Class and Description
    Chessboard
    The backend representation of the chessboard
    ChessboardView
    A visual representation of a chessboard based on the chessboardlayout.xml file
    Chesspiece
    Superclass for the various Chesspieces
    DBAdapter
    This class handles all queries towards the database
    DBAdapter.DatabaseHelper
    Appropriate implementation of SQLiteOpenHelper
    EnPassant
    This class is used to occupy spaces where a pawn can be captured through en passant
    GameActivity
    The activity that displays the game
    King 
    Pawn
    Represents a pawn
    PlayerFrame
    A view that contains a player's name, clock, captured pieces and provides info on the game state(in check etc)
    PositionHashFactory
    This class hashes positions to check for draw by repetition
    Preferences.MyPreferenceFragment
